channel.title: Entra-ID on Küse's Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Entra-ID on Küse's Codes

item.title: Rails app with Azure Entra-ID authentication
item.description:
This post demonstrates how to use Azure Entra-ID for authentication. According to What is Microsoft Entra ID?,

Microsoft Entra ID is a cloud-based identity and access management service that your employees can use to access external resources.
